text: Nans is a commune in the Doubs department in the Bourgogne-Franche-Comt√© region in eastern France. ==Geography== Nans lies from Rougemont at the foot of a high, horseshoe-shaped cliff. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Nans on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Nans, Doubs
